scripts.build: npm run jshint && npm run prep-dists && cp src/taboo.js dist/taboo.js && npm run uglify && npm run add-license
scripts.add-license: concat -o dist/taboo.js license.js dist/taboo.js && concat -o dist/taboo.min.js license.js dist/taboo.min.js && replace '@@VERSION' $npm_package_version dist/taboo.js dist/taboo.min.js && replace '@@DATE' $(date '+%m-%d-%Y') dist/taboo.js dist/taboo.min.js && replace '@@YEAR' $(date '+%Y') dist/taboo.js dist/taboo.min.js
